Highlighted Clause: "Binding arbitration except for any disputes, claims, suits, actions, causes of action, demands or proceedings (collectively, 'disputes') in which either party seeks to bring an individual action in small claims court or seeks injunctive or other equitable relief for the alleged unlawful use of intellectual property, including, without limitation, copyrights, trademarks, trade names, logos, trade secrets or patents, you and the company (a) waive your and the company's respective rights to have any and all disputes arising from or related to these terms or the services resolved in a court, and (b) waive your and the company's respective rights to a jury trial."
Plain Language Summary: "You and the company waive the right to resolve disputes in court, instead agreeing to binding arbitration, with certain exceptions such as individual actions in small claims court or disputes over intellectual property rights."

Highlighted Clause: "Our services are provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and non-infringement."
Plain Language Summary: "The services are offered without any warranties, whether express or implied, and the company disclaims warranties including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement."

Highlighted Clause: "Indemnification to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, you will indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the company and our officers, directors, agents, partners and employees (individually and collectively, the 'company parties') from and against any loss, liability, claim, demand, damages, expenses or costs (including attorney's fees) ('claims') arising out of or related to (a) your access to or use of our services."
Plain Language Summary: "You agree to indemnify and hold the company parties harmless against any losses or damages arising from your use of the services, to the fullest extent permitted by law."

Highlighted Clause: "By posting any content or reserving a name, you represent and warrant that you have the lawful right, including all necessary intellectual property rights, to distribute and reproduce such content or use such name for any purpose, commercial or otherwise."
Plain Language Summary: "By submitting content or reserving a name, you warrant that you have the legal rights, including intellectual property rights, to distribute and reproduce the content or use the name commercially or otherwise."

Highlighted Clause: "Company, in its sole discretion, may from time to time impose limits on the ability to purchase content via the services. Company, in its sole discretion, may from time to time impose limits on the ability to sell content via the services."
Plain Language Summary: "The company reserves the right to impose limitations on the ability to purchase or sell content through the services at any time, at its sole discretion."

Highlighted Clause: "All rights and licenses granted to you under these terms will immediately be revoked upon our termination of the agreement or our suspension of your access to the services."
Plain Language Summary: "Upon termination or suspension of the agreement by the company, any rights and licenses granted to you under these terms will be immediately revoked."

Highlighted Clause: "Limitation of liability the company and the other company parties will not be liable to you under any theory of liability—whether based in contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, warranty, or otherwise—for any indirect, consequential, exemplary, incidental, special or punitive damages or lost profits, even if the company or the other company parties have been advised of the possibility of such damages."
Plain Language Summary: "The company limits its liability and will not be held responsible for any indirect, consequential, or special damages, among others, even if it has been advised of the potential for such damages."

Highlighted Clause: "The company is not responsible for withholding, collecting, reporting, or remitting any sales, use, value added, or similar tax arising from any transaction completed via the services."
Plain Language Summary: "The company disclaims responsibility for managing tax obligations such as withholding, collecting, reporting, or remitting sales, use, or value added taxes for transactions made through the services."
